song.title: Sunrise in Dreamland
song.info: Darkness and tranquility dominates the hours of pre-dawn, until the first ray of light, the first dim glow, would come, and melt a hole in the afar. The sun then softly rises, gently knocking on your dreams, bringing with it the fire of life and the whisper of hopes. It's a brand new day, with much to accomplish. It's everyone's turn to give, in any way. Even knowing that somebody else breath easier because you live, is a valuable accomplishment.
